entry.title: 25 Yards 3/8" White Organza Ribbon With Satin Edge
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_5140
Type: Ribbons
Price: 1.73

[About]

QTY: 1 Spool
Material: 100% Premium Woven Nylon Sheer
Color: White
Product Length: 25 Yards | 75 FT
Product Width: 3/8 inch
Pattern: Solid
Style: Satin Edge
Feature: Shinny, Shimmering and Light Weight
Perfect for gift wrapping, craft, and DIY decorations
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Elegant products demand elegant packaging—and our satin edge organza ribbon adds just the right touch of sophistication and classiness to any gift box, basket, or bag. We present to you an amazing selection of all your favorite color ribbons to craft loveliest of masterpieces. These splendid ribbons are ideal for wedding favors, birthday favors and other special occasion keepsakes. These elegant ribbons are made of sheer organza with glistening satin edging. Our shimmering satin edge organza ribbons are high quality 100% woven nylon sheer with elegant satin edging. Use it lavishly to make beautiful accents to party favors, centerpieces, table setting and even bouquets. Great for gift wrapping, decorating hair bows and accessories, embellishing corsages and bouquets, etc.

Additional Information:

  • Perfect for Gift Wrapping
  • Uses : Wedding, Party, Birthday, Events, Gift, Favors, DIY, Decoration

entry.title: 85" x 85" Royal Blue Satin Edge Embroidered Sheer Organza Square Table Overlay
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_2220
Type: Overlays
Price: 8.28 - 390.98 (2 variants)

[About]

Quantity: 1 Table Overlay
Material: Organza with Satin Leaf Embroidery and Satin Borders
Color: Royal Blue
Size: 85" x 85" including 4" Satin Borders
Edges: Serged
How to Care: Hand wash only. Hang dry, Don't use a dryer.
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Add a dash of elegant sophistication into your wedding and banquet tables with these delicately fashioned see-thru organza overlays accented with the standout nature of satin and stunning leaf-motif embroidery. Let this avant-garde design impart a swanky touch to your table decor, outshining your event and celebration. Bring the best out of your table cloths by adorning them with these chic overlays that combine the delicacy of sheer organza fabric with the modern flair of satin Leaf-Motif embroidery and glossy sheen of silky satin borders.

Additional Information:

  • Material: Organza with Satin Leaf Embroidery & 4" Satin Borders
  • Measurements: 85" x 85"
  • Edges are Serged.
  • How to Care: Hand wash only. Hang dry, don't use dryer.
  • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Decoration

[Information]

Creating a celebratory atmosphere at a special event is all about choosing the right Decor to fit the mood of festivity. Table overlays can play a major role in taking the events decoration from blah to breathtakingly beautiful! Table overlays are an ideal way to glamorously dress up a banquet hall. Add color, texture, and luster to your party tables where guests will be spending a considerable part of the evening, with our glimmering overlays. Stunning shiny sequin circles are used to create a gorgeous ring design throughout premium quality organza fabric. Glam your wedding or banquet tables up with our sequin accented organza overlays that will add an extra glimmer and shimmer to your jollification. Pair with our sequin adorned napkins, chair covers, runners, or chair sashes to create a cohesive party mood, or with crisp white shades to add extra flair and dimension to your party ambiance.

Additional Information:

  • Measurements: 85" x 85"
  • How to Care: Dry clean only.
  • Material: Shiny Sequin Beads in a circular pattern atop Organza fabric
  • NOTE: Sale is for overlay only, no other accessories included
  • Edges are Serged
  • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Decoration

  • Size: 72"x72" square
  • Edges are hemmed.
  • Works beautifully with our tablecloths
  • All sizes are approximate measurements.

[Information]

Let the magic of dreamy daisies together with the bedazzling shimmer and glimmer of shiny sequins create an ethereal feel of a paradise orchard at your wedding or party ambiance. This glamorous fabric is fashioned brilliantly using sheer, delicate organza fabric having a see-through quality, accentuated with the shiny sequin circles and mesmeric daisy flowers embroidered all over the fabric with an iridescent thread. This daisy inspired fabric oozes the oodles of glitz and glam into your banquet or reception tables. The angelic hue of sheer organza together with florals and sequins imparts an ethereal feel of a snowy ground filled with beautiful budding daisies all around, topped with twinkling sequin accents.

Additional Information:

  • Material: Embroidered Daisy Pattern with Iridescent Sequins sewn on
  • Size: 72"x72" square
  • Edges are hemmed.
  • Works beautifully with our tablecloths
  • For table overlay only, table covers and other decorations are sold separately.
  • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Decoration

entry.title: Pack of 2 - 52"x84" Purple Sheer Organza Curtains With Rod Pocket Window Treatment Panels
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_3160
Type: Curtains
Price: 13.99 - 159.48 (2 variants)

[About]

  • 1 QTY: 2 Curtain Panels
  • Each Panel Size: 52" x84"
  • Material: Sheer Organza
  • Color: Purple
  • Rod Pocket Size 2.5" wide
  • Comes with a Vinyl Bag
  • Care Instruction: Hand wash only. Hang dry, don't use dryer.
  • ﻿Perfect for room divider, pair with backdrop stand
  • All sizes are approximate measurements
  • Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Impart a look of elegance and sophistication to your space with our lush sheer organza curtain panels. Crafted from premium quality organza fabric, these panels is a stylish way to maintain privacy while infusing any room with natural sunlight. Keep your homes bright and sunny without worrying about visibility from outside, as our deluxe organza curtains are transparent enough to let fresh air and sunlight through, yet thick enough to provide unparalleled privacy. Pair these with our printed or sequined curtains to create an imperial display, or use these on their own for a touch of graceful simplicity. Easy to install rod pockets let you hang these chic drapes anywhere effortlessly and in flexible opening and closing of the panel. Choose the color to blend naturally with your home interior, augmenting your living room and bedroom windows or French and Sliding Patio doors.

Additional Information:

  • Material: Sheer Organza
  • Color: Purple
  • Size: 52" W x 84" L
  • Rod Pocket Size 2.5" wide
  • Comes with a Vinyl Bag
  • Quantity: 2 pcs
  • Care Instruction: Hand wash only. Hang dry, don't use dryer.
